author: Simon Difford
description: Reminiscent of a Hemingway Special, this citrusy, vanilla-laced Daiquiri has a tangy bittersweet finish.
name: Vanilla & Grapefruit Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 50 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
15 ml Licor 43 (or other spiced vanilla liqueur)
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
